sections.text: The one-year MPP at Princeton SPIA is designed for mid-career professionals to enhance their leadership and analytical skills in international and domestic public policy.

items: Customized selection of courses across Princeton
sections.text: The flexible one-year curriculum emphasizes policy workshops and elective coursework tailored to career goals.

items: Mid-career professionals with 7+ years of policy experience
sections.text: Applicants should be established professionals with substantial policy experience.
Graduates return to senior leadership roles in government, international organizations, NGOs, and academia.
